# EHDS Explorer

> A comprehensive, open-access platform for exploring the European Health Data Space (EHDS) Regulation (EU) 2025/327.

## About

EHDS Explorer helps citizens, healthcare professionals, health-tech companies, researchers, and policymakers understand and navigate the EHDS regulation. It provides the full text of the regulation with structured navigation, plain-language explanations, definitions, cross-regulation references, and interactive learning tools.

## Key Features

- Full regulation text: all 98 articles, 85 recitals, and annexes with structured chapter/section navigation
- Definitions glossary with source references
- Plain-language translations of complex legal text
- Cross-regulation reference mapping (GDPR, MDR, AI Act, Data Governance Act, etc.)
- Country-level implementation tracking across EU/EEA Member States
- Health authority directory
- AI-powered assistant for regulation questions
- Interactive learning games (quiz, flashcards, word search, true/false, who am I?)
- Stakeholder-specific views (citizens, healthcare professionals, health-tech companies)
- Implementing acts tracker
- Multilingual support
- Bookmarks, annotations, and note-taking
- Accessibility controls and dark mode

## Core Content

- **Articles**: 98 articles organised across 11 chapters covering primary use, secondary use, governance, infrastructure, enforcement, and more
- **Recitals**: 85 recitals providing interpretive context
- **Definitions**: 40+ defined terms from Article 2
- **Annexes**: Technical annexes on EHR categories, data categories, and more
- **Implementing Acts**: Tracker for delegated and implementing acts required by the regulation

## Primary Audiences

- EU/EEA citizens and patients wanting to understand their health data rights
- Healthcare professionals adapting workflows to EHDS requirements
- Health-tech companies assessing compliance obligations
- Researchers and policymakers working on health data governance

## Important Disclaimers

- This platform is an educational and informational tool, not a source of legal advice
- Always refer to the Official Journal of the European Union for the authoritative regulation text
- Content may be updated as implementing acts and national transposition measures are adopted

## Links

- Website: https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app
- Regulation full text: https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app/articles
- Definitions: https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app/definitions
- Country tracker: https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app/overview
- AI Assistant: available to registered users
- Games: https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app/games

## Contact

For questions or feedback, use the in-app feedback tools or visit the Help Center at https://ehdsexplorer.lovable.app/help
